channel.title: Music – 데미안 라이스(Damien Rice)
channel.description: Recent content in 데미안 라이스(Damien Rice) on Music

item.title: 데미안 라이스(Damien Rice) - 9 Crimes
item.description:
Leave me out with the waste
This is not what I do
It’s the wrong kind of place
To be thinking of you
It’s the wrong time
For somebody new
It’s a small crime
And I’ve got no excuse

쓰레기를 갖고 날 떠나
이건 내가 하는 게 아냐
널 생각하기에는
잘못된 장소지
새로운 사람을 만나기에는
잘못된 시기지
작은 범죄
난 아무 변명거리도 없어

Is that alright?
Give my gun away when it’s loaded
Is that alright?
If you don’t shoot it how am I supposed to hold it
Is that alright?
Give my gun away when it’s loaded
Is that alright with you?

괜찮은 건가?
장전된 내 총을 넘긴 건
괜찮은 건가?
네가 쏘지 않으면 내가 왜 갖고 있는 거지
괜찮은 건가?
장전된 내 총을 넘긴 건
넌 괜찮은 거야?

Leave me out with the waste
This is not what I do
It’s the wrong kind of place
To be cheating on you
It’s the wrong time
She’s pulling me through
It’s a small crime
And I’ve got no excuse

쓰레기를 갖고 날 떠나
이건 내가 하는 게 아냐
널 속이기에는 잘못된 장소지
그녀가 나를 잊기에는
잘못된 시기지
작은 범죄
난 아무 변명거리도 없어

Is that alright?
I give my gun away when it’s loaded
Is that alright?
If you dont shoot it, how am I supposed to hold it
Is that alright?
I give my gun away when it’s loaded
Is that alright
Is that alright with you?

장전된 내 총을 넘긴 건
괜찮은 건가?
네가 쏘지 않으면 내가 왜 갖고 있는 거지

괜찮은 건가?
넌 괜찮은 거야?

Is that alright?
I give my gun away when it’s loaded
Is that alright?
If you don’t shoot it, how am I supposed to hold it
Is that alright?
If I give my gun away when it’s loaded
Is that alright
Is that alright with you?

괜찮은 건가?
장전된 내 총을 넘긴 건
괜찮은 건가?
네가 쏘지 않으면 내가 왜 갖고 있는 거지
괜찮은 건가?
장전된 내 총을 넘긴 건
괜찮은 건가?
넌 괜찮은 거야?

Is that alright?
Is that alright?
Is that alright with you?
Is that alright?
Is that alright?
Is that alright with you?

괜찮은 건가?
괜찮은 건가?
넌 괜찮은 거야?
괜찮은 건가?
괜찮은 건가?
넌 괜찮은 거야?

No…

아니야…
